text: Mike J. Dunleavy (born May 5, 1961) is an American politician. He is a member of the Republican Party. He is the 12th and current Governor of Alaska serving since December 2018. He was a member of the Alaska Senate from January 15, 2013 until January 8, 2017. In 2017, he announced he would run for Governor of Alaska in 2018, but left the race in September 2017.Dunleavy suspends campaign for Alaska governor as Huggins files to run, Alaska Dispatch News, Nathaniel Herz, September 12, 2017. Retrieved September 13, 2017. In December 2017, Dunleavy announced his return to the race for governor.Denleavy back in race for governor, Mat-Su Valley Frontiersman, December 22, 2017. He would go on to defeat Democrat Mark Begich. == Personal life == He is married to Rose who is from the Kobuk River Valley community in Noorvik. They have three children together named Maggie, Catherine, and Ceil. All of them were raised in both urban and rural Alaska. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Alaska Category:Politicians from Alaska Category:Politicians from Scranton, Pennsylvania Category:People from Juneau, Alaska Category:Educators from Alaska Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Educators from Pennsylvania
title: Mike Dunleavy (politician)
